Title: Establishes tenants' right to offset rental payments by the cost of certain emergency repairs
Summary: Allows a tenant to offset against future rental payments the cost of certain emergency repairs a landlord is either unwilling or unable to correct within twenty-four hours of notice to the landlord of the need for such emergency repair, provided that the tenant provides landlord with itemized cost accounting of all emergency repairs made.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to tenants' right to offset rental payments by the cost of certain emergency repairs
